Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the metropolitan transit authority establish a thirty-day fare cap program
Summary: Requires the metropolitan transit authority establish a thirty-day fare cap program which provides customers an unlimited pass for the month after paying a set amount of fares.
LawCode: Add ยง1279-m, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring One Metro New York establish a thirty-day fare cap
